title: Xiaomi Mi Mix 3: UK release date, specs, price and all the latest news

3](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-reviews-

**As expected, the Xiaomi Mi Mix 3 was revealed at a launch event in China ‚Äì
and there are a handful of reasons to get excited about this Android
powerhouse‚Äôs official UK release, thanks to some mind-boggling specs that
include 10GB of RAM and incoming 5G connectivity.**

We were already expecting to see the Mi Mix 3 get a UK release ‚Äì read on to
find out why ‚Äì and now it seems to be all-but-confirmed following Xiaomi‚Äôs
tie-up with affordable mobile network Three.

The Mi Mix 3 might be the first phone to land on the back of the partnership,
but all signs point to it arriving sooner rather than later.

Witness the following tweet from Three in the aftermath of the announcement of
its new relationship with Xiaomi.

> no info as yet but keep your eyes peeled üëÄ >KM

>

> ‚Äî ThreeUKSupport (@ThreeUKSupport) [October 30,
2018](https://twitter.com/ThreeUKSupport/status/1057271335431405568?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw)

Now, ‚Äúkeep your eyes peeled‚Äù could mean all manner of things, but given the
fact that we know Xiaomi has its sights trained on the UK market ahead of the
commercial launch of [5G](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/what-
is-5g-vs-4g-2911748) in 2019, it would be a real shock if the Mi Mix 3 didn‚Äôt
end up coming to the British High Street ‚Äì even if it‚Äôs under a slightly
revised moniker.

Read on for everything you need to know about the new Xiaomi flagship,
including the Mi Mix 3‚Äôs specs, UK release date and price.

## Xiaomi Mi Mix 3 specs and design

On the design front, the Mi Mix 3 follows in the footsteps of the [Oppo Find
X](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/oppo-find-x) (and offers a taste of
what‚Äôs to come from the [Honor Magic
2](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/honor-magic-2-release-date-specs-
price-3609121)) by featuring a sliding display mechanism that hides the
unsightly notch housing the device‚Äôs front cameras.

There‚Äôs a total of four of these ‚Äì 12-megapixel wide-angle and telephoto
lenses sit on the rear, while a 24-megapixel ‚Äòselfie cam‚Äô is augmented by
2-megapixel sensor on the front of the device.

The Mi Mix 3 offers the kind of full-screen design that‚Äôs now virtually
ubiquitous on high-end phones, but it ups the ante compared to previous Xiaomi
flagships by using an [OLED](https://www.trustedreviews.com/opinion/oled-vs-
led-lcd-2924602) panel measuring 6.4 inches and offering a 1080p resolution.
There‚Äôs also the familiar [Snapdragon
845](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/snapdragon-845-benchmark-phones-
speed-3390981) SoC under the hood, which isn‚Äôt a surprise, and it‚Äôll support
fast 10W [wireless charging.](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/what-is-
wireless-charging-3602142)

Sound like pretty much every other Android flagship released this year?
There‚Äôs a couple of things that make the Mi Mix 3 stand out and have us
excited about its potential wider release.

The first is that a 10GB RAM option broke cover at the Chinese launch event,
which to the best of our knowledge is a first for a mainstream phone. This
might seem an unnecessarily beefy spec, but the demands of on-the-go streaming
and handset gaming aren‚Äôt going to lessen any time soon (quite the opposite)
so we‚Äôre excited to see how this translates into real world performance.

## Xiaomi Mi Mix 3: UK release date and price

![Mi Mix
3](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-reviews-
placeholder-3.svg)

Secondly, and perhaps more importantly for the average user, is that a 5G Mi
Mix 3 is now confirmed for a 2019 European release. The UK might just about
still constitute part of Europe then, at least in the eyes of global marketing
teams, so we‚Äôre pegging a UK Mi Mix 3 launch as more likely than not ‚Äì MWC
2019 would be the obvious regional launchpad for the phone.

For sure we know that Xiaomi is launching its phones in the UK from November
8. The firm has also confirmed it is opening its first UK store on November
10, at the Westfield shopping centre in White City. It has promised a flagship
device and maybe we‚Äôll see the smart home products and electric scooter?

**Related:[When is Black Friday?](https://www.trustedreviews.com/deals/when-
is-black-friday-3582854)**

Pricing for the Mi Mix 3 starts at 3299 Chinese yuan, which directly converts
to about ¬£365 at time of writing, for the base model with 6GB of RAM and 128GB
of on-board storage. Additional cost details should be available soon, with
India in particular understood to be one of the countries getting the Mi Mix 3
first.
